title: eVogues Plus Size Lace Overlay Romper Dress
description: Please pay attention to the actual measurements below and choose the correct size for you.Bust: (1XL) 36-40 inches (2XL) 38-42 inches (3XL) 40-44 inches Waist: (1XL) 36-40 inches (2XL) 38-42 inches (3XL) 40-44 inches Hip: (1XL) 38-44 inches (2XL) 40-46 inches (3XL) 42-48 inchesLength: (1XL) 30 inches (2XL) 30.5 inches (3XL) 31 inches Skirt Length : 1XL = 12 inches, 2XL = 12.5 inches, 3XL = 13 inches.  Shorts Length: 1XL = 14 inches, 2XL = 14.5 inches, 3XL = 15 inches.
Plus size romper dress features lace overlay design. Long sheer lace sleeves. Top is lined in the front, fully see through in the back. Deep cut v-neckline.
This is a romper, shorts are longer than the skirt, this is by design.
Please check the actual measurements listed for a comfortable fit. Available in 1XL=Size 13/14, 2XL=Size 15/16, 3XL=Size 17/18.
